QuestData.Title: Dread Space
QuestData.Description: Shado-Pan marksmen keep a constant watch over the Dread Wastes from the top of the Serpent's Spine. They would surely welcome the aid of a skilled $c such as yourself.$B$BTake a kite and check in with Bowmistress Li.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bowmistress Li on the Serpent's Spine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Bowmistress Li on the Serpent's Spine.
